## CommandFileData

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/legacy/src/loadLegacyCommands.ts" sourceLine="81" packageName="@commandkit/legacy" />

Represents the data structure for a command file, including its data, options, and runners.

```ts title="Signature"
interface CommandFileData {
    data: CommandData;
    options?: CommandOptions;
    chatInput: CommandRunner<ChatInputCommandInteraction>;
    messageContextMenu?: CommandRunner<MessageContextMenuCommandInteraction>;
    userContextMenu?: CommandRunner<UserContextMenuCommandInteraction>;
    autocomplete?: CommandRunner<AutocompleteInteraction>;
    category: string | null;
    path: string;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### data

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/legacy/types/command-data#commanddata'>CommandData</a>`}   />

The command data, which includes the name, description, and options.
### options

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/legacy/interfaces/command-options#commandoptions'>CommandOptions</a>`}   />

The options for the command, including permissions and execution conditions.
### chatInput

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/legacy/types/command-runner#commandrunner'>CommandRunner</a>&#60;ChatInputCommandInteraction&#62;`}   />

The function to run when the command is executed as slash command.
### messageContextMenu

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/legacy/types/command-runner#commandrunner'>CommandRunner</a>&#60;MessageContextMenuCommandInteraction&#62;`}   />

The function to run when the command is executed as a message context menu command.
### userContextMenu

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/legacy/types/command-runner#commandrunner'>CommandRunner</a>&#60;UserContextMenuCommandInteraction&#62;`}   />

The function to run when the command is executed as a user context menu command.
### autocomplete

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/legacy/types/command-runner#commandrunner'>CommandRunner</a>&#60;AutocompleteInteraction&#62;`}   />

The function to run when the command is executed as an autocomplete interaction.
### category

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string | null`}   />

The category of the command, if applicable.
### path

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The file path of the command.
